Package com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub

Class ClientRegistrationService

java.lang.Object
com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.ClientRegistrationService
@Service public class ClientRegistrationService extends Object
Associates client names with their STOMP session id and announces new connections and disconnects via the standard messaging topic.

  • Method Details

    • registerClient

      public void registerClient (String stompSessionId, String clientName)
      Associates a distinct client name with a STOMP session id
      Parameters:
      stompSessionId - STOMP session id
      clientName - client name

    • dropClient

      public void dropClient (String stompSessionId) throws NoSuchClientException
      Disassociates a client name from a STOMP session id and announces the leave.
      Parameters:
      stompSessionId - STOMP session id
      Throws:
      NoSuchClientException - when no client name is associated with that session id

    • isClientRegistered

      public boolean isClientRegistered (String stompSessionId)
      Determines whether a STOMP session id is associated with a client name.
      Parameters:
      stompSessionId - STOMP session id
      Returns:
      true if a client name is associated with given STOMP session id

    • getClientName

      public String getClientName (String stompSessionId)
      Retrieves the associated client name of the STOMP session id or a default value in case of an unregistered client.
      Parameters:
      stompSessionId - STOMP session id
      Returns:
      name of the client or `unregistered`
